description.narrative: National structures producing statistics are capable of providing reliable and disaggregated data to monitor the situation of women and children at central and decentralized levels by 2018.

sector.narrative: Administrative data, registers and non-MICS household surveys and censuses
Child marriage - surveys (e.g. KAP, VACS), data analysis/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use
Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)
Situation Analysis or Update on women and children
Stimulating demand for and capacity to use data

title.narrative: Burundi United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Burundi Country Programme Document 2010-2014 Results Matrix
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2018 Burundi: Impact Evaluation of the Lumière Project
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: National structures producing statistics are capable of providing reliable and disaggregated data to monitor the situation of women and children at central and decentralized levels by 2018.

description.narrative: UNICEF, with the United Nations Population Fund and UN Women, continued to strengthen the National Institute for Statistics and Economic Studies' capacity for data analysis, following publication of the third Demographic and Health Survey: this will enable better targeted and evidence-based programming. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2018

title.narrative: Existence of functional planning and M&E systems in the two pilot provinces

baseline.value: M&E tools on Communal Plan for Community Development is available

actual.value: 2018:Methodological framework for CPCD data collection and reporting available and disseminated to users at national and communal levels

title.narrative: Availability of a report on the Demographic and Health Survey 2016-17

target.value: 2018:Availability of a report on the secondary analysis
